name: vscode-bigquery
description: An extension for querying Google Cloud Platform's BigQuery analytics datasets directly from VS Code.

commands.title: BigQuery: Run selected text as Query

bigquery.keyFilename.description: Full path to the a .json, .pem, or .p12 key downloaded from the Google Developers Console. If you provide a path to a JSON file, the projectId option is not necessary. NOTE: .pem and .p12 require you to specify the email option as well.

bigquery.projectId.description: (Optional) The project ID from the Google Developer's Console, e.g. 'grape-spaceship-123'. This is NOT needed if you are provide a key in JSON format

bigquery.email.description: (Optional) Account email address. Required when using a .pem or .p12 keyFilename.

bigquery.useLegacySql.description: Specifies whether to use BigQuery's legacy SQL dialect for this query. The default value is false. If set to false, the query will use BigQuery's standard SQL: https://cloud.google.com/bigquery/sql-reference/

bigquery.location.description: The geographic location of the job. Required except for US and EU. See details at https://cloud.google.com/bigquery/docs/dataset-locations#specifying_your_location.

bigquery.maximumBytesBilled.description: Queries that will have bytes billed beyond this limit will fail (without incurring a charge). If unspecified, this will be set to your project default.

bigquery.outputFormat.description: Controls the output format for query results.
